children.custom_preconds:
API Documentation is here: https://confluence/display/MYAPI/Header+-+User+Agent

os~Android-5.0.1 app~AndroidLaunchpad-3.0.0 uid~89697892-ddaa-45b7-a489-ee65e77702fe mcvid~no_value

os~Android-7.0 app~AndroidLaunchpad-3.0.0 uid~d8cacb5a-cd04-42e0-a2a3-05f9e05ddb22 mcvid~no_value
children.title: Verify that key value pairs separated by ~
Verify that User-Agent headers MUST have the following keys: 'os', 'app', and 'uid'
Verify that it should contains key: 'cversion', 'oversion', and 'sversion' - Versions will be sent as separate header keys.
Verify that the os key-value pair MUST be of the following form: os~(OS)-(version)
Verify that the app key-value pair SHOULD be of the following form: app~(OS)(appname)-(appversion)
Verify that the 'uid' value MUST be of the following form: uid~(deviceandinstallidentifier)
Verify that the 'uid' value must be identical for the same install on the same device across app launches and across endpoints.
Verify that the 'uid' value must be different on re-install (i.e., when the app is installed, then fully UNinstalled, then installed again).
Verify that the 'uid' value is to be remain the same on upgrades from the store.
Verify that the 'uid' value is not to be a static property of the device (i.e., must be randomly generated)
Verify that the 'uid' value must be different across devices.
Verify that the uid must be 10 or more characters long.

children.custom_preconds:
X-cversion: x.x.x 
X-oversion: x.x.x 
X-sversion: x.x.x

X-oversion	2.0.0
X-sversion	2.0.0
